name: shadow-force
flavor_text: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.
effect_text_extend:
Inflicts regular damage.  User vanishes for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

This move ignores the effects of detect and protect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect_text_simple: User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect.
